localeSelection.title: Select your language
localeSelection.description: Choose your preferred language for the application

navigation.logoutConfirmDescription: You are about to close the application. No data will be lost.

onboarding.title: Configure your application
onboarding.testQuestion: Would you simply like to test RowingBeacon?
onboarding.testDescription: If you simply wish to test the application, you can enable demo mode to use sample data.
onboarding.launchDemo: Launch the application in demo mode
onboarding.demoPasswordAlert: The admin password for demo mode is "{{password}}"
onboarding.passwordHelp: The password will be useful to protect sensitive actions.
onboarding.boatsHelp: Enter the name of your boats, one per line
onboarding.boatsPlaceholder:
Example: 
100 Swift
101 Hudson
102 WinTech
103 Empacher
104 Vespoli
105 Swift
106 WinTech
200 Hudson
201 WinTech
202 Hudson
203 Vespoli
401 Hudson
402 WinTech
800 Filippi
onboarding.routesHelp: Enter the name of your routes, one per line
onboarding.rowersHelp: Enter the name of your rowers, one per line

boathouse.noBoatsForSearch: No boats to display for search "{{search}}"

session.coachedDuringSession: The crew were coached during the session:
session.incidentDuringSession: There was an incident during this session
session.endDateMustBeAfterStartDate: End date must be after start date
session.errorSavingSession: An error occurred whilst saving the session
session.sessionEndedSuccessfully: Session end has been recorded successfully
session.minimumLevelRequired: Rowers for this boat must, at minimum, have the level
session.minimumValidRowersRequired: It is necessary to select at least {{count}} rower(s) with at least the required levels for this boat.

alert.rowersAlreadyOnSession: Some rowers have already started another session. Do you wish to continue?
alert.invalidRowersLevel_one: <0>1</0> rower does not have the required level for this boat.
alert.invalidRowersLevel_other: <0>{{count}}</0> rowers do not have the required level for this boat.

logbook.title: Logbook
logbook.fileDownloaded: "{{fileName}}" has been downloaded to your "Downloads" folder

stats.title: Statistics
stats.infoMessage: Many additional statistics are available in the "Management" tab, "Rowers" and "Boats" pages

parameters.title: Management
parameters.alertFromDescription: Display an alert when x rowers or more don't have the required criteria for the selected boat
parameters.blockFromDescription: Block use of the boat if x rowers or more don't have the required criteria for the selected boat
parameters.boatLevelSystemDescription: These settings allow you to restrict the recording of boat sessions to certain rowers.
parameters.boatLevelSystemDescription2: Configuring a minimum category and/or rower type will alert the note-taker or block recording depending on the global level system configuration (found in "miscellaneous settings")
parameters.addOneOrMoreRowers: Add one or more rowers (one per line)
parameters.confirmArchiveRower: Do you wish to archive rower "{{rowerName}}"? It will no longer be possible to record sessions with this rower, but recorded data will not be affected.
parameters.confirmArchiveBoat: Do you wish to archive boat "{{boatName}}"? It will no longer be possible to record sessions with this boat, but recorded data will not be affected.
parameters.coachNoteDescription: This note will be displayed at the top of the "Boathouse" page
parameters.importDataDescription: Import boats, routes and rowers from a JSON file. Data will be added to existing data.
parameters.exportDataDescription: Export all boats, routes and rowers to a JSON file
parameters.levelSystemDescription: Configure alert and block thresholds for each boat type based on number of rowers who don't meet required criteria.
parameters.autoStartDescription: By enabling this option, RowingBeacon will launch at system startup
parameters.sensitiveActionsWarning: Warning: these actions may have irreversible consequences
parameters.deleteAllDataWarning1: You are about to delete all application data.
parameters.deleteAllDataWarning2: It will be impossible to recover it once deleted. Make sure you have exported important data.
parameters.deleteConfirmationText: I wish to delete all my data
parameters.deleteConfirmationInstruction: Confirm by writing exactly "{{text}}" in the field below.
parameters.confirmArchiveRoute: Do you wish to archive route "{{routeName}}"? It will no longer be possible to record sessions with this route, but recorded data will not be affected.
parameters.addOneOrMoreBoats: Add one or more boats (one per line)
parameters.languageDescription: Select your preferred language for the application
